Instruction: Combine flour, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl.
Add water and melted butter to the flour mixture.
Mix with a fork until it forms a ball.
Transfer the dough to a surface dusted with flour and knead it gently about 10 times.
Shape the dough into a flat circle that is 3/4 to 1 inch thick. Heat a greased frying pan over medium heat.
Put the dough in the heated pan and cook until golden brown, approximately 15 minutes on each side. Use two spatulas for easy flipping.
Cut into pieces, serve, and savor!
